game.name: Gloomy Eyes
game.shortDescription: A cozy horror, “self-coop”, adventure about two unlikely souls who forge a forbidden bond and journey together to find the sun. Explore eerie yet comforting Tim Burton-esque levels, switch between two unique characters, and solve brain-teasing puzzles.
game.developers: Atlas V, Be Revolution Gaming, 3Dar, Fishing Cactus, ARTE France
